Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about two friends, Maria Lopez and Isabella Rodriguez, deciding to change their hiding spots during a game of hide and seek to avoid being found by Klaus. @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Isabella, do you want to change hiding spots? I think we've been here for too long and Klaus might find us soon if we stay in the same spot.
Isabella Rodriguez
I think you're right, Maria. Let's find a new spot to hide in.
Maria Lopez
Okay, let's split up and find new hiding spots. We'll meet back here in 10 minutes.
Isabella Rodriguez
Okay, sounds good. I'll go this way and you go that way. Let's find the best hiding spot!
Maria Lopez
Okay, let's split up and find new hiding spots. We'll meet back here in 10 minutes.
